alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 10:53PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Aitkin, southern St. Louis, northwestern Carlton and northwestern Lake Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1053 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Cherry, to near Meadowlands, to near McGregor, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hibbing, Cloquet, Big Sandy Lake, Virginia, Eveleth, Mountain Iron, Hoyt Lakes, Gilbert, Aurora, Babbitt, Biwabik, Cherry, Floodwood, Cotton, Cromwell, Toivola, Brookston, Meadowlands, Tamarack, and Fairbanks. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
